content: **about the pattern** sleepyhead socks are knit cuff-down in the round they feature a 3x1 rib on the leg no separate cuff and top of the foot and a german short-row heel feel free to replace with a different one of your choice it is a very easy-to-follow and almost mindless pattern so you can work on it as your bed-time project and finally ribbed texture makes them highly elastic so they are extra-comfy and can be worn as loungewear or bed socks if you are looking for the same pattern in sport-weight yarn click here 1 **size** 1 2 3 fits 18 21 24 cm / 7 8 25 9 5 at the widest part of the foot to be worn with 1 cm / 0 5 negative ease **measurements** * foot circumference 17 20 23 cm / 6 75 7 75 9 * foot length adjustable * cuff length adjustable **gauge** 30 sts x 38 row = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in stockinette for more precise result swatch in the round on the same needles you will use for the socks **needles** 2 5 mm / us 1 5 or size to get pattern gauge in your preferred format of sock needles either 5 dpns long 80-100 cm / 32-40 circulars for magic loop or short ~25 cm / 9 circulars etc **yarn** 100g or 385 m 421 yds of fingering yarn sample was knit out of 1 ball of mondim retrosaria 100 % portuguese wool 100 g / 385 m 421 yds **notions** 3 markers 2 can be the same + 1 unique for bor tapestry needle scissors tape measure sock blockers optional in case you are not familiar with some of the techniques additional videos will help you to understand the instructions - click here 2 check other socks on instagram - #sleepyheadsockslight 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sleepyhead-socks 2 https //youtube com/playlist list=plnxknmrmtdco5bucifyqaj2j7_wc19i38&si=wca9_be2b6byrpnn 3 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/sleepyheadsockslight/
